articles.title: Mutual Funds See Highest-Ever Inflows In April, SIPs Continue Record Streak - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Net investment into equity and equity-linked schemes declined 16% over the previous month to Rs 18,917.1 crore in April, according to AMFI data.
